name: Software Development Project Categories
description: List of software development project categories

itemListElement.name: Frontend Web Development
itemListElement.description: Creating user-facing websites or web applications using technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

itemListElement.name: Backend Web Development
itemListElement.description: Creating server-side logic and database integration for web applications.

itemListElement.name: Mobile App Development
itemListElement.description: Creating applications for mobile devices such as smartphones and tablets.

itemListElement.name: Game Development
itemListElement.description: Creating video games for consoles, PC, or mobile devices using various programming languages and game engines.

itemListElement.name: Database Development
itemListElement.description: Designing and implementing databases for storing and organizing large amounts of data.

itemListElement.name: Data Management
itemListElement.description: Designing and implementing Applications for manipulating and organizing large amounts of data.
